amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of any funds to provide economic assistance or payments under section 15 of the Waste Isolation Pilot Plant Land Withdrawal Act until the Waste Isolation Pilot Plant commences disposal operations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any funds to be used to provide economic assistance or payments under section 15 of the Waste Isolation Pilot Plant Land Withdrawal Act until the Waste Isolation Pilot Plant commences disposal operations.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Schaefer, Dan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schaefer, Dan amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
